attributes.action: Have visual warning systems installed at pedestrian railway crossings to aid those with a hearing impairment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many railway crossings are used each day by people of all abilities, however there appears to be a lack of visual warning for those who are hard of hearing. The provision of only an audible warning, prevents the safe passage of many who can not hear the bell, surely this must be changed, so as to include everyone.
